Tr li cu hi ny, ng Hng nhn mnh: "iu u tin ti xin cc bn b ch XIN trong n Xin vic". "ng bao gi ni i "xin" vic lm. Ti ch c g  CHO cc bn c. Cc bn i bn ci cc bn c v ti l ngi mua ci cc bn cho. V th trong tuyn dng, hy ni v vic cc bn c g  bn. Sc lao ng? L th r nht ri. Thi gian? Rt cng bng, Cha ban cho chng ta 24 gi 1 ngy, khng ai c nhiu hn ai. Ci khc nhau  ch: Vi sc khe , vi thi gian , cc bn to ra bao nhiu gi tr". Nhiu bn ch mun nhn ci cc bn cn, ch c bit chng ti cn g u. Cha chi  hi lng, thng, i du lch nc ngoi, c lm vic trc tip vi sp...  Shark Hng cho bit thi gian ca ng tnh bng pht, ch khng tnh bng gi hay ngy, v c qu nhiu vic phi lm. "Nu ch bn thi gian v sc khe th cc bn khng c gi lm u. Ch bn sc lao ng thun ty th gi khng cao. Cc bn phi c thm tri thc, kinh nghim, c thm s tinh thng (talent), c thm kungfu, tuyt chiu, c nhng g ch cc bn c. Cc bn cng c gi tr cao th cng bn c gi". "Ti sao chuyn gia c tr lng cao nh vy, bi ngi ta bn gi tr ngi ta to ra trong 1 pht. iu ti mun ni l: Khi i phng vn xin vic, cc bn phi bit cc bn bn ci g. ng bao gi ni xin x. Nh tuyn dng c rt nhiu mo  th xem cc bn thc s thch th, am m v c nng lc cho v tr cc bn ng tuyn, hay ch n gin l cc bn ch cn vic lm, cn lm g cng c", Shark Hng chia s. ng cng nhc n mt trng hp ng vin ng tuyn vo v tr Gim c kinh doanh, nhng khi nghe ng by t v tr ny khng cn trng, m cng ty ch trng v tr tp v, ng vin kia cng gt u xin nhn. "Cc bn theo kiu min l c vic lm, m khng bit mnh c nng lc trong vic g, v khi n vi chng ti th cc bn mang c g", v c mp Shark Tank Vit Nam cm thn. iu th hai ng Hng mun nhn nh, tuyn dng l cu chuyn mua bn. Mt bn mua sc lc, tr tu, kinh nghim, mt bn bn ci mnh c. "Cc bn bn ci doanh nghip cn, v chng ti mua ci cc bn c. Vy th cc bn phi hiu doanh nghip ang cn g  cho cho trng v cho cho c gi. Doanh nghip ang cn i tng m v tr  th cc bn phi hiu rt r m t cng vic, hiu rt r trc khi a ra  ngh". "Cc bn tr i phng vn ch hi em c ci g, lng bao nhiu, c ngh my ngy, lng thng g khng, c i du lch, c o to khng. Nhiu bn ch mun nhn ci cc bn cn, ch c bit chng ti cn g u. Cha chi  hi lng, thng, i du lch nc ngoi, c lm vic trc tip vi sp... Tt c nhng ci  l ci cc bn cn, ch khng phi ci ti cn. Khi i phng vn xin vic th cc bn phi th hin cc bn c g v chng ti cn g. Hai yu t ny gp nhau th chc chn cc bn thnh cng", Shark Hng nhn mnh.

content.194: Trng Thanh Thy (Thu Mui) - ngi sng lp d n Sng kin Ung th Mui - Salt Cancer Initiative (SCI)  t trn hi 20:40 ngy 24/01/2020 theo gi Los Angeles (tc 11:40 ngy 25/01/2020 - ngy 01/01 nm Canh T theo gi Vit Nam) ti Los Angeles, M sau mt thi gian di kin cng chin u vi cn bnh ung th phi giai on cui, theo thng tin t Ban iu hnh D n. Cui nm 2016, Thy Mui pht hin mnh b ung th phi giai on cui,  ci tui m nhiu ngi vn hng say gy dng s nghip. "Ht hong", nhng c khng ngh ung th n vi c l mt iu g  "khng cng bng". "Thy lun tin rng tt c mi th xy ra u c l do. Lc  ngh l, nu mnh sng  lu th mnh s tm ra c l do. Cho nn phi c gng sng  lu", Thy chia s ti s kin Womens Summit 2018. Thy Mui sinh nm 1985 ti Vit Nam v hc tp ti M sau khi c gia nh ch chuyn n y vo nm 2003. Sau khi tt nghip ngnh Khoa hc my tnh ti i hc Nam California (USC) nm 2009, Thy Mui tr v Vit Nam lp nghip. Nm 2008, Thy Mui tr v qu hng Bin Ha thnh lp cng ty sn xut sa chua ng lnh c tn l Parallel Frozen Yogurt cng vi ngi bn. Khi ang cn vn hnh cng ty sa chua, Thy Mui  bt tay gy dng doanh nghip u tin trong mng cng ngh. Cng mt ngi bn i hc, Thy Mui lp ra GreenGar  cng ty ni ting vi ng dng v c tn Whiteboard. Sau  Thy Mui tip tc pht trin ng dng nhn tin Tappy  sau ny c cng ty game di ng ti Thung lng Silicon tn Weeby mua li vi mc gi 7 ch s. Thy Mui cng tng lm vic ti Weeby vi vai tr Gim c pht trin kinh doanh khu vc Chu . Thy Mui  tng l nhn vt chnh trong b phim ti liu "She Started It" - cng chiu nm 2016 - c ghi hnh trong sut 3 nm xy dng s nghip ca c. B phim  c trnh chiu hn 30 quc gia v hng trm cng ty cng ngh v trng i Hc hng u th gii. Thy Mui c t bo BBC mnh danh l "N hong khi nghip" Vit v c vinh doanh trong danh sch "30 under 30" nm 2015 ca tp ch Forbes Vit Nam v Top 50 gng mt ph n nh hng nht Vit Nam nm 2017. Nm 2016, khi ang  nh cao s nghip, Thy Mui pht hin mnh b ung th phi giai on cui. Vi mong mun "khng ai phi chin u vi ung th mt mnh", Thy thnh lp D n Sng kin Ung th Mui  Salt Cancer Initiative (SCI)  h tr cng ng bnh nhn ung th c th tip cn vi ngun thng tin chun xc v to cng ng  cng nhau chia s v truyn cm hng, gii ta tm l v cm xc. SCI l h sinh thi h tr cho bnh nhn ung th u tin ti Vit Nam v kt ni cc t chc, doanh nghip v mnh thng qun ti bnh nhn ung th. Trong mt status ni v bnh tnh ca mnh, Thy Mui ni vi mt ngi anh trong lng startup: "Ung th giai on cui n ging nh li h thng vy , gi c x tr hay lm g i na cng ch l  gii quyt nhng vn  cc b - v phi  di cn vo xng nn au, th l i x tr xng cho bt au - ri b phn no khc trn c th m h mnh sa ch  thi! Ch by gi ko th gi l cha ung th c na v t bo ung th  di cn khp ngi ri! Anh u th no p i xy li ton h h thng? Cng ging nh em khng bao gi ht c bnh ung th c! Bao gi cht th mi ngng cha tr, n gin vy thi m!" "Thu Mui ra i nhng ch s khng cn phi chu au n na. Mi ngi s nh ti ch vi n ci y nng lng to sng v nhng ng gp khng ngng ngh ti giy pht cui cng", Ban iu hnh D n SCI cho bit. SCI s t chc mt bui tng nim m cng  bn b v nhng ngi thn ti gi li tm bit ch. Thi gian v a im s c cp nht trn fanpage ca Salt Cancer Initiative sau khi gia nh a tin chnh thc.

content.274: CEO Wefit Khi Nguyn tng chia s 4 t th "cht" khi khi nghip thu cn th ngy, v hin Wefit (hin i tn thnh WeWow) ang i mt vi t th "cht" th 5  bi ton dng tin. Khi mi ngi hi h quay tr li nhp cng vic sau Tt dng lch, b phn chm sc khch hng ca Wefit bin li tm s u nm, chia s v nhng kh khn m startup ny ang vp phi trong vn hnh sn phm v qun tr ti chnh. "Thc t, trong giai on na cui nm va qua, WeWow  gp kh nhiu tr ngi trong qu trnh vn hnh sn phm v qun tr ti chnh. Kh khn l vn  thng thy trong startup v ln ny thc s phn ln li n t i ng iu hnh ca WeWow. iu ny  khin chng ti cha th mang n nhng dch v tt nht n qu khch hng v i tc - nhng ngi  lun ng hnh, theo di v ng h WeWow. Bi vy, chng ti chn thnh gi li xin li n ton th qu khch hng v i tc", Wefit tm s. Tuy nhin, ging bo c v cha ngng vi startup ny. Mt startup nn tng cn cn i gia khch hng (end users) v doanh nghip bn hng (merchants). Nhng hin Wefit ang gp khng hong vi c 2 i tng ny. Hin khng ch spa, phng tp t n ng, ngng lin kt m ngay c n khch hng cng ang phn nn rt nhiu v cch vn hnh cng nh chm sc khch hng ca Wefit. P.T  mt khch hng mua gi tp Wefit t 30/9 cho bit: Thi gian u s dng Wefit rt OK, vi s bui tp khng gii hn  cc phng tp. n thng 12/2019, s bui tp ca khch VIP mua gi tp gn 2 nm ny  gim t "khng gii hn" sit dn xung 25 bui/thng, v mi y nht l cn 10 bui/thng/phng tp. n 13/1, phng tp quen ca c l Hng Anh ngng lin kt vi Wefit. Gi tp ca T. c gi 9,2 triu ng, vi thi gian tng l 22 thng (gi 18 thng tng thm 4 thng). Do bt tin trong chuyn i phng tp, T. yu cu c hon tin nhng c cho bit pha Wefit khng c phn hi g. Trn fanpage chnh thc ca Wefit, nhiu khch hng cng phn nn khi rt nhiu phng tp ngng hp tc vi startup ny. Mt s khch hng cn dng t "la o" khi khng th i tp 1 thng nay, v nhiu phng tp ngng lin kt vi Wefit do startup kt ni ny khng thanh ton tin. Pha phng tp, spa cng t Wefit n ng. Facebooker Khnh Ngn, lm vic ti Saturn Spa bin status t Wefit n ng 2 thng v kht ln kht xung 3 ln vn cha thanh ton. Trc , c thng tin mt phng tp Wefit tng "khoe" l cc xn x khi kt ni c l Salsa Spring ngng lin kt vi nn tng ny v Wefit chm thanh ton, dn ti cng n ln n 100 triu ng. Tr li Tr thc tr khi , CEO Wefit Khi Nguyn cho bit: "Startup cng c mt cht kh khn v dng tin cui nm, ly thu ny b chi kia v va phi u t thm, cng thm ma ng l ma thp im ca fitness nn c n nhng khng phi l tt c cc i tc, mt s i tc ny s tr chm hn i tc khc". Khi cho bit cng ty t nay n cui nm s cht vng gi vn mi v do  s c thm kinh ph, thng 3/2020 Wefit s y mnh mt sn phm na mi ra v khi  s c nhiu thay i". "Hin ti Wefit ang y mnh sn phm v lm p nn cn thm tin u t". Nm 2019, bn cnh lnh vc ct li l kt ni phng tp, Wefit m thm mt lot mng mi nh kt ni b bi, spa, ra mt thng hiu Wejoy v i tn startup thnh WeWow. S ra mt ny  lm no ng th trng beauty mt thi gian, vi lng spa, salon lin kt vi Wefit ln ti 500. Tuy nhin, lnh vc beauty khc hon ton vi lnh vc fitness, vi vic qun l cht lng sn phm kh khn hn nhiu. Wefit kinh doanh theo m hnh thu chit khu trc tip trn gi dch v. V d Wefit bn cho ngi dng gi 1.550.000 ng/3 thng (mi thng c 4 ln s dng dch v) tin  s  v Wefit v startup ny s thanh ton (sau khi tr chit khu) cho cc spa, salon m khch hng s dng dch v. Tuy nhin, nhiu spa, salon sau mt thi gian lin kt vi Wefit  ct gim cng on dch v ( ct gim chi ph), thm ch bn gi ring gim gi tng ng Wefit cho chnh khch hng Wefit. Hin quanh khu  th Hapulico, cc spa trong danh sch ca Wefit nh Mc An, La Mer, Dng Tm, Charm Nail... u  ngng lin kt vi startup ny. Wefit c Khi Nguyn thnh lp vo thng 9/2016, vi mc tiu tr thnh thng hiu hng u trong ngnh Fitness Vit Nam. Khi tng lt vo top 10 gng mt tr tiu biu ca Vit Nam nm 2017; top 3 CEO tim nng nm 2016 ti chng trnh Startup Festival do VTV t chc; top 16 gng mt tr Th  khi nghip xut sc nm 2017 v tng vo danh sch "30 under 30 Vit Nam" do Forbes bnh chn. Khi tng chia s v 4 t th cht ca bn thn nh lm ra sn phm khng ai dng, mt qu nhiu thi gian lm sn phm nn ht tin, sn phm khng convert c ra doanh s v cht v c qu nhiu tin. Trong , t th "cht v c qu nhiu tin" chnh l t th cht ca Wefit khi gi c vn v dng tin vt qu kh nng qun tr ti chnh ca team sng lp.

Pha trong ch, cc quy thuc u ng lot treo bin bo vi ni dung khng bn khu trang. "Chng ti ang phi hp vi cng an kinh t  kim tra, trng hp pht hin trong kho vn cn hng nhng nh thuc treo bin khng bn l c tnh gm hng v s b x theo quy nh php lut. My hm nay, c mt s trng hp kinh doanh thuc ti y ln facebook ku gi khng nhp hng, bn khu trang trn hi nhm chng ti ang phi hp vi cng an  kim tra, xem xt. content.220: Hin nay, cc dng xe in ang c xu hng c th trng a chung v con ngi ngy c  thc hn trong vic bo v mi trng. Chng ti lun mong mun to ra mt phng tin xanh trong thnh ph  hn ch s  nhim. Hin nay, ti cc  th ln u b  nhim khng kh m nguyn nhn 80% l do cc phng tin giao thng. V vy, ti  ny ra  tng sn xut xe p c tr lc in. i vi xe p c tr lc in th c th s dng  i lm hoc i u , nu thch th s tr thnh phng tin  rn luyn sc khe. Chng ti cng nhn ra rng, cng ngy, mi ngi s hng n s dng cc phng tin bo v mi trng v xe p, xe p tr in hay xe in s tr thnh xu hng ca tng lai.  - Khi bt u khi nghip vi HayBike, anh  gp nhng kh khn g? Chng ti  gp rt nhiu kh khn, t  tng n vic thc hin ha  tng l mt chng ng rt di. 5, 7 phin bn u tin m i ng ca chng ti nghin cu u khng thnh cng v phi "p i xy li". c bit, i vi ngnh sn xut ni chung v sn xut xe p ni ring th kh khn ln nht l nn cng nghip ph tr cho sn xut  Vit Nam rt yu. Chng ta ph thuc vo nc ngoi qu nhiu v qu lu.  sn xut ra sn phm c hm lng cng ngh hon ton ca Vit Nam th rt kh. Nhng cng may mn trong qu trnh khi nghip, chng ti  gii quyt c vn  ny. Chng ti  tm c nhng i tc ph hp v hiu c nhu cu m HayBike a ra. - Hin nay trn th trng cng c nhiu doanh nghip sn xut cc dng xe in nh xe my in v xe p in, vy u l li th canh tranh ca HayBike? Thc ra quan im ca chng ti l khng c i th m ch c bn hu. Chng ta c th ngi li vi nhau, cng bn lun v chia s. Mi doanh nghip s c mt th mnh ring, c th h tr nhau. Cng nhiu ngi lm th cng c nhiu ngi cng m rng th trng. V hin ti, y l mt th trng rt ln. Nu nh c gi cho bn thn mnh th ch nh ht ct trong sa mc v khng trng thnh hn c.  thi im hin ti, mi trng cng ang  nhim m nguyn nhn chnh l do cc phng tin giao thng nh  ni  trn. V vy, khi c nhiu n v sn xut cc dng xe in th chng ti khng n c trong hnh trnh tuyn truyn  mi ngi s dng xe in ni chung v xe p in c tr lc ni ring. Bn cnh , th trng cn rt rng nn mi doanh nghip s tp trung vo mt phn khc, c nhiu doanh nghip th khch hng s l ngi c hng li. H s c nhiu la chn, n v no cung cp nhng sn phm thc s cht lng s thnh cng. - Nhng t nht, anh cng c iu g   t tin vo li th cnh tranh ca HayBike ch? Tt nhin l c. HayBike l cng ty u tin ti Vit Nam sn xut xe p c trlc in. n thi im ny cng khng th khng nh ngi i u l ngi chin thng nhng t nht chng ti cng  tch ly c kinh nghim v lun c gng  tt hn. i ng lm vic ca HayBike rt mit mi, tc  lm vic ca chng ti phi gp 3 n 4 ln tc  lm vic trung bnh ca ngi Vit Nam. - V sao anh li quyt nh cho ra i dng sn phm Trevi Bike - xe p bng khung tre c tr lc in? C 3 l do khin chng ti quyt nh s dng vt liu tre: Th nht, khi sn xut cc dng xe khc ca HayBike, chng ti cng kh hi lng nhng ngc nhn ra th trng th gii, c nhiu quc gia  sn xut c xe p c khung titan, cacbon v nhiu vt liu cao cp khc nhng  Vit Nam, n thi im hin ti, chng ta vn cha sn xut c xe p bng khung nhm. Nu nh a cc dng sn phm ca HayBike - xe p khung thp ra th trng th gii th s khng c ngha l g c! Chng ti trn tr v suy ngh lm th no  ui kp vi th trng th gii, chng l by gi li i nhp khu v, ri sau  li bn ra th trng, m i nhp khu th mi mi ph thuc. Th hai, nu chng ta to ra mt sn phm  sc ht,  sc mnh  c th i ra khi bin gii ca quc gia th phi to ra c s khc bit. V khng nguyn liu no khc ngoi tre c th thay th. Bn cnh , ti mun a vn ha ca ngi Vit n vi th gii, sn phm ca mnh  u th vn ha ca mnh  . Th ba, trc y, chng ta vn thng loanh quanh trong nhng cu chuyn ngn hn, kim tin nhanh th sm mun g cng thua. Vi vic s dng vt liu tre  to ra khung xe, chng ti mun hng n nhng gi tr bn vng. - Qu trnh nghin cu Trevi Bike, cc anh  mt bao nhiu thi gian v gp nhng kh khn g? i ng ca chng ti  t my m, tr gi trong sut 2 nm qua v cui cng  cho ra i c sn phm hon thin nh hin ti  phn phi  th trng chu u, c th l c, Canada v H Lan. "Ti c bit th trng khu trang y t hin nay ang tn ti 2 loi khu trang l khu trang gia cng v khu trang sn xut nh my. Tuy vy, HMD Global sau  li mc phi kh nhiu sai lm, t tri nghim km ci ca chic Nokia 9 Pureview cho n lch pht hnh sn phm thng xuyn b y li. Sc cnh tranh ngy mt gia tng t cc thng hiu Trung Quc cng c coi l nguyn nhn khin cho hng ny gp kh. Sau tht bi ca Nokia 9 Pureview, Nokia c cho l vn ang pht trin mt mu u bng tip theo (9.2 Pureview)  ra mt vo cui nm 2020. Ti s kin MWC 2020 sp ti, thng hiu ny s ra mt mu smartphone 5G di tn gi Nokia 8.2. Cc mu gi r 5.2 v 1.3 cng c ch i ti MWC, tuy vy dch bnh Corona ang honh hnh rt c th s gy nh hng xu ti khi u ca Nokia trong nm mi (Trung Quc l th trng c HMD Global u tin pht hnh cc sn phm mi).

Theo , be khuyn co ti x v khch hng lun s dng khu trang y t khi lu thng trn ng, ra tay dit khun thng xuyn, trnh tip xc trc tip vi ngi ang st, ho v n chn ung si  ch ng phng chng vi rt, bo v sc khe cho mnh v cng ng. Ring vi ti x, vic eo khu trang l yu cu bt buc. Nu cc ti x khng tun th, hng s p dng cc mc ch ti ph hp cho n tm kha ti khon hot ng. Yu cu ny theo i din Be Group nhm phng chng trc tnh hnh dch bnh mi din bin phc tp v nhu cu vn chuyn hnh khch tng cao sau Tt Nguyn n. Ngoi ra, be cng tng gi bo him chm sc sc khe ca cng ty bo him PTI cho cc ti x t yu cu. Mt trong nhng quyn li l nu ti x khng may nhim virus corona vn c bo him nh cc bnh l thng thng. C khch v ti x u eo khu trang. nh chp chiu 2-2 ti TP HCM. nh: Linh Anh Nhiu hng xe cng ngh khc ti Vit Nam cng a ra cc quy nh phng chng dch virus corona i vi i tc ti x. i din hng xe cng ngh GoViet cho bit doanh nghip  t chc tuyn truyn vn ng ti x v cc bin php phng trnh virus corona nh kim tra sc kho c b st, au hng, s mi, ho, kh th...  phng trnh, hng ny cng yu cu ti x eo khu trang y t, khng khc nh ba bi, mang theo dung dch kh trng, thng xuyn ra tay, trnh tip xc vi ng vt hoang d. Grab Vit Nam cng khuyn co ti x eo khu trang  bo v sc kho cho bn thn v khch hng. Trc tnh hnh dch virus corona nh hin nay, Grab  a ra cc bin php v nng cao mc  sn sng trong vic gii quyt nhng s c tim n trong qu trnh hot ng, ch khch. Ti x ca Grab cng c nhc nh lm sch v kh trng phng tin thng xuyn hn, nht l eo khu trang trong khi ch khch.
content.161: Trung Quc s bm 22 t USD vo th trng ti chnh. Con s ny s l khng   ngn chn TTCK v ng nhn dn t lao dc trong phin giao dch u tin sau k ngh Tt vn  phi ko di hn v dch bnh, nhng s phn no lm du bt cn bn tho trn ton cu do ni lo v virus corona.  l nhn nh c a ra bi cc chuyn gia phn tch sau khi NHTW Trung Quc cng b mt lot bin php  h tr th trng. PBOC cho bit s s dng cc hp ng mua loi o ngc  bm thm 1.200 t nhn dn t thanh khon vo th trng trong phin giao dch ngy mai. K t ngy 23/1, khi th trng i lc giao dch phin cui cng trc k ngh Tt, ng nhn dn t  hi ngoi  gim gi 1%, c lc ri xung di ngng quan trng 7 t i 1 USD (nhng ch trong thi gian ngn). Hp ng chng khon Trung Quc tng lai trn sn Singapore gim 7,5%, bo hiu 1 phin khi u nm mi y au thng. Bao trm th trng l ni lo virus corona mi -  lm hn 300 ngi thit mng tnh n thi im ny - s khin kinh t ton cu chm li. Cc ti sn ng lot b bn tho  c cc th trng pht trin v th trng mi ni. Chng khon M xa sch s im tng c t u nm n nay, trong khi nhiu th trng mi ni gim im mnh nht trong gn 2 nm tr li y. Cc ti sn an ton nh vng v tri phiu M tng vt. Theo Mansoor Mohi-uddin, chuyn gia phn tch cao cp ti NatWest Markets (Singapore), cc bin php ca Trung Quc s "to ra m  cho th trng", v s tt hn na cho tm l nh u t nu nh PBOC c th ngn ng nhn dn t ri xung di mc 7. Tuy nhin khng phi ai cng ngh rng Trung Quc c th km hm  gim ca th trng, c bit khi xt n nhng tc ng kinh t m virus gy ra. Trong kch bn tc ng l nghim trng nhng ngn hn, mc tng trng GDP ca nn kinh t ln th hai th gii c th xung cn 4,5% trong qu I, theo Bloomberg Economics, thp nht k t 1992.
